metadata.name: ABSENTMINDED SHEEP
metadata.description:
Story behind the artwork:

"Absentminded Sheep" is the return of the sheep from my artwork "Unimpressed Sheep". Three audacious could not resist to put themselves again in front of the forces of Mother Nature in scene. Completely unconcerned and absent minded they stand there, surrounded by the golden grain, until the storm departs again. 

They will come again, for sure! 

Artist: Kathrin Federer
Created 2022 in Photoshop
5023 x 4019 px | 300 dpi
Edition 1/1

Valid Copyright and License:

The first collector receives the original JPG and TIFF on request.
